messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I have lived and worked in the area since 1989. I support a new bridge across the Thames and I am in favour of a new outer ring road incorporating a better managed M4. I strongly support encouraging businesses to start up and or move to Reading. I see this as a fantastic way to get our young people working in rewarding jobs that will pay well and secure the towns long term future. However, housing shortages worry me and I would do more to endorse the use of brown field sites as a solution to our affordable housing problem.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supports constructing a new bridge across the Thames and favors the development of a new outer ring road incorporating an improved M4.
Strongly supports encouraging new businesses to start and existing businesses to move to Reading, aiming to provide rewarding jobs for young people.
Intends to endorse the use of brown field sites to mitigate the affordable housing shortage.

housing.content: However, housing shortages worry me and I would do more to endorse the use of brown field sites as a solution to our affordable housing problem.
